name: Painful Realization
Text: Failure: You may discard a card. If you do, choose one: Stop a character whose cost is X or less; or gain X power. X is equal to one plus the cost of the discarded card.
Fancy Text: [b]Failure:[/b] You may discard a card. If you do, choose one: Stop a character whose cost is X or less; or gain X power. X is equal to one plus the cost of the discarded card.

name: Red Tape
Text:
When you play this obstacle, prepare this ambush.
While this ambush obstacle is prepared, each mission costs your opponent power +1 to play for each other mission played before it this turn.
Ambush (culture/ingenuity): You may pay 1 power. if you do, prepare this ambush.
Fancy Text:
When you play this obstacle, prepare this ambush.
While this [b]ambush[/b] obstacle is prepared, each mission costs your opponent power +1 to play for each other mission played before it this turn.
[b]Ambush ([CULTURE]/[INGENUITY]):[/b] You may pay 1 power. if you do, prepare this ambush.

name: Replicator Regeneration
Text:
You may play this obstacle at a culture or ingenuity mission. If you do, prepare this ambush.
Failure: Replicator obstacles cost power -1 to play until the end of the turn.
Ambush (science): Replicator obstacles cost power -1 to play until the end of the current mission.
Fancy Text:
You may play this obstacle at a [CULTURE] or [INGENUITY] mission. If you do, prepare this ambush.
[b]Failure:[/b] Replicator obstacles cost power -1 to play until the end of the turn.
[b]Ambush ([SCIENCE]):[/b] Replicator obstacles cost power -1 to play until the end of the current mission.

name: Re'tu Rebel Incursion
Text:
You may play this obstacle at a culture or combat mission. If you do, prepare this ambush.
Failure: Complications cost power -1 to play until the end of the turn.
Ambush (ingenuity): You may play up to two complications at no cost.
Fancy Text:
You may play this obstacle at a [CULTURE] or [COMBAT] mission. If you do, prepare this ambush.
[b]Failure:[/b] Complications cost power -1 to play until the end of the turn.
[b]Ambush ([INGENUITY]):[/b] You may play up to two complications at no cost.

name: Romantic Entanglements
Text:
To play this obstacle, choose two team characters that share the same statuses.
Until the end of the current mission, each time one of the chosen characters' status changes, the other's does too to match it. (Statuses are: blocked, unblocked, ready, assigned, stopped, and incapacitated.)
Fancy Text:
To play this obstacle, choose two team characters that share the same statuses.
Until the end of the current mission, each time one of the chosen characters' status changes, the other's does too to match it. [i](Statuses are: blocked, unblocked, ready, assigned, stopped, and incapacitated.)[/i]

name: Rushed Demonstration
Text:
To play this obstacle, drain 3.
When you play this obstacle, chose a character. They are blocked.
Fancy Text:
To play this obstacle, [b]drain 3[/b].
When you play this obstacle, chose a character. They are blocked.

name: Rushed Reconnaissance
Text:
To play this obstacle, drain 3.
When you play this obstacle, chose a character. They are blocked.
Fancy Text:
To play this obstacle, [b]drain 3[/b].
When you play this obstacle, chose a character. They are blocked.

name: Sir, Are You There?
Text:
When you play this obstacle, place it on a team character.
While this obstacle is on a character, they are blocked and can't be unblocked.
At the end of the current mission, destroy this obstacle.
Fancy Text:
When you play this obstacle, place it on a team character.
While this obstacle is on a character, they are blocked and can't be unblocked.
At the end of the current mission, destroy this obstacle.

name: Slashed Ambitions
Text: When you play this obstacle, choose a character, then your opponent may discard any number of cards whose total cost is equal to or greater than that character's cost. If they don't, stop the chosen character.
Fancy Text: When you play this obstacle, choose a character, then your opponent may discard any number of cards whose total cost is equal to or greater than that character's cost. If they don't, stop the chosen character.

name: Sodan Ambush
Text:
You may play this obstacle at a science or ingenuity mission. If you do, prepare this ambush.
Failure: Stop a character. You may ready a Jaffa adversary.
Ambush (combat): Choose one: Stop a character; or ready a Jaffa adversary.
Fancy Text:
You may play this obstacle at a [SCIENCE] or [INGENUITY] mission. If you do, prepare this ambush.
[b]Failure:[/b] Stop a character. You may ready a Jaffa adversary.
[b]Ambush ([COMBAT]):[/b] Choose one: Stop a character; or ready a Jaffa adversary.

name: Spoiled Princess
Text: Failure: Place this obstacle on a character. They get: "To assign this character or to use their activated ability, their owner must pay 1 power." When your opponent succeeds at a mission, destroy this obstacle.
Fancy Text: [b]Failure:[/b] Place this obstacle on a character. They get: "To assign this character or to use their activated ability, their owner must pay 1 power." When your opponent succeeds at a mission, destroy this obstacle.

name: Tense Dogfight
Text:
Victory: The current mission gets difficulty +1. Prepare this ambush.
Ambush (combat): Choose a hero ship. It gets firepower -1 until the end of the current mission. Choose a villain ship. It gets firepower +1 until the end of the current mission.
Fancy Text:
[b]Victory:[/b] The current mission gets difficulty +1. Prepare this ambush.
[b]Ambush ([COMBAT]):[/b] Choose a hero ship. It gets firepower -1 until the end of the current mission. Choose a villain ship. It gets firepower +1 until the end of the current mission.

name: Uninterested
Text: When you play this obstacle, you may return a blocked support character to their owner's hand.
Fancy Text: When you play this obstacle, you may return a blocked support character to their owner's hand.

name: Unmasked
Text:
Dominion.
When you play this obstacle, choose an assigned character.
While a Wraith adversary is assigned, this obstacle gets difficulty +1 for each glyph on the chosen character.
Fancy Text:
[b]Dominion.[/b]
When you play this obstacle, choose an assigned character.
While a Wraith adversary is assigned, this obstacle gets difficulty +1 for each glyph on the chosen character.

name: Wraith Resilience
Text:
When you play this obstacle, choose an assigned character.
Failure: If the chosen character is a team character, incapacitate them. If the chosen character is a support character, destroy them and you may take this obstacle into hand.
Fancy Text:
When you play this obstacle, choose an assigned character.
[b]Failure:[/b] If the chosen character is a team character, incapacitate them. If the chosen character is a support character, destroy them and you may take this obstacle into hand.

name: Zombie Outbreak
Text: This obstacle gets difficulty +2 if there are ten or more character cards in your opponent's discard pile.
Fancy Text: This obstacle gets difficulty +2 if there are ten or more character cards in your opponent's discard pile.

name: Daedalus
Subtitle: Ghost Ship
Text:
When you assign this ship, at the end of the current mission, destroy it.
Victory: You may pay 3 power. If you do, take this ship into hand.
Fancy Text:
When you assign this ship, at the end of the current mission, destroy it.
[b]Victory:[/b] You may pay 3 power. If you do, take this ship into hand.

name: Korolev F-302
Text:
This ship costs power -1 to play if there was a failed mission this turn.
Victory: The next mission this turn gets difficulty -1.
Fancy Text:
This ship costs power -1 to play if there was a failed mission this turn.
[b]Victory:[/b] The next mission this turn gets difficulty -1.

name: Martin Lloyd's Ship
Subtitle: Escape Vessel
Text:
Success: You may place an assigned support character face down beneath this ship.
You get 1 experience for each card beneath this ship.
Fancy Text:
[b]Success:[/b] You may place an assigned support character face down beneath this ship.
You get 1 experience for each card beneath this ship.

name: Gray Alien Fighter
Text: Victory: You may destroy this ship, if you do, the current mission gets difficulty +1 for each prepared ambush obstacle that has been triggered this mission.
Fancy Text: [b]Victory:[/b] You may destroy this ship, if you do, the current mission gets difficulty +1 for each prepared [b]ambush[/b] obstacle that has been triggered this mission.

name: Gray Alien Warship
Subtitle: Ruthless Predator
Text:
This ship gets firepower +1 for each prepared ambush obstacle that has been triggered this mission.
Victory: You may play up to two complications at no cost.
Fancy Text:
This ship gets firepower +1 for each prepared [b]ambush[/b] obstacle that has been triggered this mission.
[b]Victory:[/b] You may play up to two complications at no cost.

name: Leviathan
Subtitle: Mysterious Threat
Text:
Each time you assign this ship, choose a hero ship. As long as this ship is assigned, the chosen ship is blocked.
Victory: You may pay 2 power. If you do, destroy the chosen ship.
Fancy Text:
Each time you assign this ship, choose a hero ship. As long as this ship is assigned, the chosen ship is blocked.
[b]Victory:[/b] You may pay 2 power. If you do, destroy the chosen ship.

name: Niam
Subtitle: Bound By His Code
Text:
To assign Niam, stop a support character.
This card can't be included in decks.
Fancy Text:
To assign Niam, stop a support character.
[b]This card can't be included in decks.[/b]

name: Adria
Subtitle: Empowered Leader
Text:
Each time you pay Adria's revive cost, place the cards you used face down beneath her instead of discarding them.
Purge 3 cards from beneath Adria -- Gain 1 power. You may ready Adria.
Fancy Text:
Each time you pay Adria's revive cost, place the cards you used face down beneath her instead of discarding them.
Purge 3 cards from beneath Adria -- Gain 1 power. You may ready Adria.

name: Amaterasu
Subtitle: System Lords Representative
Text:
Amaterasu gets revive cost -1 for each other Goa'uld adversary.
Each time you assign Amaterasu, you may turn an obstacle face down (it becomes a complication). If you do, gain power equal to its cost minus one.
Fancy Text:
Amaterasu gets revive cost -1 for each other Goa'uld adversary.
Each time you assign Amaterasu, you may turn an obstacle face down [i](it becomes a complication)[/i]. If you do, gain power equal to its cost minus one.

name: Anubis
Subtitle: Galactic Tyrant
Text:
At the end of your opponent's turn, if they have no power remaining, place a hegemony counter on Anubis.
Failure: If Anubis has three or more hegemony counters on him, you win the game.
Fancy Text:
At the end of your opponent's turn, if they have no power remaining, place a hegemony counter on Anubis.
[b]Failure:[/b] If Anubis has three or more hegemony counters on him, you win the game.

name: Armin Selig
Subtitle: Whistleblower
Text:
While Armin Selig is ready, each time your opponent plays a mission, you may draw a card.
When you place this adversary card in your discard pile (for any reason), your opponent loses 1 power.
Fancy Text:
While Armin Selig is ready, each time your opponent plays a mission, you may draw a card.
When you place this adversary card in your discard pile [i](for any reason)[/i], your opponent loses 1 power.

name: Cassius
Subtitle: Asuran Sentry
Text:
Each time your opponent would place one or more cards into their discard pile, you may stop Cassius. If you do, your opponent purges those cards instead.
Failure: Purge a card from your opponent's discard pile.
Fancy Text:
Each time your opponent would place one or more cards into their discard pile, you may stop Cassius. If you do, your opponent purges those cards instead.
[b]Failure:[/b] Purge a card from your opponent's discard pile.

name: Cunning Queen
Subtitle: Duplicitous Ally
Text: Each time you assign Cunning Queen, your opponent must draw a card. Then, they may draw a second. If they do, they may draw a third. Then, for each card they have drawn this way, gain 1 power.
Fancy Text: Each time you assign Cunning Queen, your opponent must draw a card. Then, they may draw a second. If they do, they may draw a third. Then, for each card they have drawn this way, gain 1 power.

name: The Doci
Subtitle: Touched by Fire
Text:
Purge the Doci from your hand, pay X power -- If you are the villain player, choose an Ori obstacle or an Ori adversary in your discard pile whose cost is X. Play it from there at no cost.
Destroy the Doci, pay 3 power -- Choose an Ori obstacle to get dominion.
Fancy Text:
Purge the Doci from your hand, pay X power -- If you are the villain player, choose an Ori obstacle or an Ori adversary in your discard pile whose cost is X. Play it from there at no cost.
Destroy the Doci, pay 3 power -- Choose an Ori obstacle to get [b]dominion[/b].

name: Fenrir
Subtitle: Vanir Raider
Text:
Victory: Your opponent may stop a character. If they don't, destroy a gear.
Failure: You may ready a villain ship., If you achieved victory during this mission's ship battle, you may ready Fenrir.
Fancy Text:
[b]Victory:[/b] Your opponent may stop a character. If they don't, destroy a gear.
[b]Failure:[/b] You may ready a villain ship., If you achieved victory during this mission's ship battle, you may ready Fenrir.

name: First
Subtitle: Unnatural Evolution
Text:
Each time you assign First, you may reveal a Replicator card from your hand and place it face down beneath him.
While First is assigned, for each card beneath him, he counts as one additional replicator card.
Fancy Text:
Each time you assign First, you may reveal a Replicator card from your hand and place it face down beneath him.
While First is assigned, for each card beneath him, he counts as one additional replicator card.

name: Frank Simmons
Subtitle: Conniving NID Colonel
Text:
While this adversary card is in your villain score pile, Political obstacles cost power -1 to play.
When you place this adversary card in your discard pile (for any reason), you may take a Political obstacle or an NID card from your discard pile into hand.
Fancy Text:
While this adversary card is in your villain score pile, Political obstacles cost power -1 to play.
When you place this adversary card in your discard pile [i](for any reason)[/i], you may take a Political obstacle or an NID card from your discard pile into hand.

name: Hathor
Subtitle: Puppet Master
Text:
Purge Hathor from your hand, pay 3 power -- Stop a team character.
Purge Hathor from your hand, pay 6 power -- Incapacitate a team character. This ability costs power -1 to activate for each stopped support character.
Fancy Text:
Purge Hathor from your hand, pay 3 power -- Stop a team character.
Purge Hathor from your hand, pay 6 power -- Incapacitate a team character. This ability costs power -1 to activate for each stopped support character.

name: Kiva
Subtitle: Ruthless Commander
Text:
Outlaw.
Purge Kiva from your hand -- Chose one effect that will last until the end of the current mission: Complications cost power -1 to play; or each time you play a complication, your opponent discards a random card.
When you play Kiva, stop a hero ship.
Fancy Text:
[b]Outlaw[/b].
Purge Kiva from your hand -- Chose one effect that will last until the end of the current mission: Complications cost power -1 to play; or each time you play a complication, your opponent discards a random card.
When you play Kiva, stop a hero ship.

name: Na'onak
Subtitle: First Prime of Bynarr
Text:
Purge Na'onak from your hand, pay 3 power -- If you are the villain player, until the end of the current mission, to assign a character, your opponent must stop another character.
Failure: Incapacitate an assigned or stopped team character.
Fancy Text:
Purge Na'onak from your hand, pay 3 power -- If you are the villain player, until the end of the current mission, to assign a character, your opponent must stop another character.
[b]Failure:[/b] Incapacitate an assigned or stopped team character.

name: Oberoth
Subtitle: Voice of the Asuran
Text: Purge Oberoth from your hand -- If you are the villain player, choose power or threat, then, for each Replicator card at the current mission, drain 1. If you have chosen power, gain 1 power for each Replicator card you drained this way. If you have chosen threat, take into hand each Replicator card you drained this way.
Fancy Text: Purge Oberoth from your hand -- If you are the villain player, choose [i]power[/i] or [i]threat[/i], then, for each Replicator card at the current mission, [b]drain 1[/b]. If you have chosen [i]power[/i], gain 1 power for each Replicator card you drained this way. If you have chosen [i]threat[/i], take into hand each Replicator card you drained this way.

name: Orhuk
Subtitle: Svarog's Iron Fist
Text:
Orhuk gets difficulty +1 while a villain Jaffa ship or a Goa'uld ship is assigned.
Each time you assign Orhuk, you may destroy an assigned support character whose contributed skill is lower than Orhuk's difficulty.
Fancy Text:
Orhuk gets difficulty +1 while a villain Jaffa ship or a Goa'uld ship is assigned.
Each time you assign Orhuk, you may destroy an assigned support character whose contributed skill is lower than Orhuk's difficulty.

name: Osiris
Subtitle: Power Seeker
Text:
Purge Osiris from your hand -- If you are the villain player, and if a Goa'uld adversary is assigned, gain 2 power.
Purge Osiris from your hand, pay 3 power -- If a Goa'uld adversary is assigned, destroy a support character.
Failure: Stop a character.
Fancy Text:
Purge Osiris from your hand -- If you are the villain player, and if a Goa'uld adversary is assigned, gain 2 power.
Purge Osiris from your hand, pay 3 power -- If a Goa'uld adversary is assigned, destroy a support character.
[b]Failure:[/b] Stop a character.

name: Osric
Subtitle: Pretender
Text:
Each time you assign Osric, you may choose to give him difficulty 2 until the end of the current mission.
Success: you may drain 3. If you do, purge Osric and play an adversary at no cost.
Fancy Text:
Each time you assign Osric, you may choose to give him difficulty 2 until the end of the current mission.
[b]Success:[/b] you may [b]drain 3[/b]. If you do, purge Osric and play an adversary at no cost.

name: Rak'an
Subtitle: First Prime of Zipacna
Text: Each time you assign Rak'an, your opponent must reveal four random cards from their hand. You pay pay 1 power for each support character this revealed. If you do, your opponent discards them. Gain 1 power for each Tok'ra character this discarded.
Fancy Text: Each time you assign Rak'an, your opponent must reveal four random cards from their hand. You pay pay 1 power for each support character this revealed. If you do, your opponent discards them. Gain 1 power for each Tok'ra character this discarded.

name: Robert Kinsey
Subtitle: Connected Politician
Text:
Purge Robert Kinsey from your hand, pay X+1 power -- If you are the villain player, search your deck for a Political obstacle that costs X, reveal it, take it into hand, and shuffle your deck. Then, you may pay that obstacle at no cost.
Failure: Gain 1 power for each stopped team character.
Fancy Text:
Purge Robert Kinsey from your hand, pay X+1 power -- If you are the villain player, search your deck for a Political obstacle that costs X, reveal it, take it into hand, and shuffle your deck. Then, you may pay that obstacle at no cost.
[b]Failure:[/b] Gain 1 power for each stopped team character.

name: Selkhet
Subtitle: Baal's Envoy
Text: Each time a triggered effect would trigger, you may stop Selkhet. If you do, that effect is not triggered.(Success, failure, and victory texts are the most common triggered effects.)
Fancy Text: Each time a triggered effect would trigger, you may stop Selkhet. If you do, that effect is not triggered.[i](Success, failure, and victory texts are the most common triggered effects.)[/i]

name: Solemn Prior
Subtitle: Spiritual Guide
Text: At the end of your opponent's power phase, if this adversary card is in your villain score pile, for each Ori adversary card in your villain score pile, draw a card, then place a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck.
Fancy Text: At the end of your opponent's power phase, if this adversary card is in your villain score pile, for each Ori adversary card in your villain score pile, draw a card, then place a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck.

name: Svarog
Subtitle: Proud Warlord
Text:
Each time you assign Svarog, choose a team character whose game text becomes blank until the end of the current mission.
Failure: Incapacitate the chosen character.
Fancy Text:
Each time you assign Svarog, choose a team character whose game text becomes blank until the end of the current mission.
[b]Failure:[/b] Incapacitate the chosen character.

name: Talus
Subtitle: Asuran Commander
Text:
While Talus is assigned, he gets: "Stop a Replicator adversary -- Play a Replicator obstacle at no cost. You can do this only once each turn."
Failure: You may take a Replicator adversary card from your discard pile into hand.
Fancy Text:
While Talus is assigned, he gets: "Stop a Replicator adversary -- Play a Replicator obstacle at no cost. You can do this only once each turn."
[b]Failure:[/b] You may take a Replicator adversary card from your discard pile into hand.

name: Tanis Reynard
Subtitle: Convicted Criminal
Text:
Outlaw.
As an action, you may take a card from beneath Tanis Reynard and place it face down at the current mission (it becomes a complication).
Failure: Place a card from your hand face down beneath Tanis Reynard.
Fancy Text:
[b]Outlaw[/b].
As an action, you may take a card from beneath Tanis Reynard and place it face down at the current mission [i](it becomes a complication)[/i].
[b]Failure:[/b] Place a card from your hand face down beneath Tanis Reynard.

name: Wraith Eradicator

While Wraith Eradicator is assigned, to assign a character, your opponent must choose one: discard a random card; or drain 2.
Failure: Destroy each ready support character.
Fancy Text:
While Wraith Eradicator is assigned, to assign a character, your opponent must choose one: discard a random card; or [b]drain 2[/b].
[b]Failure:[/b] Destroy each ready support character.

name: Wraith Progenitor
Subtitle: Lifegiver

While this adversary card is in your villain score pile, Wraith adversaries cost power -1 to play.
Discard a Wraith adversary -- Play a Wraith obstacle at no cost. You can do this only once each turn.
Fancy Text:
While this adversary card is in your villain score pile, Wraith adversaries cost power -1 to play.
Discard a Wraith adversary -- Play a Wraith obstacle at no cost. You can do this only once each turn.

name: Wraith Queen
Subtitle: Impatient Interrogator
Text:
Purge Wraith Queen from your hand, pay 2 power -- If you are the villain player, your opponent must drain 4, or drain 6 if there is an assigned Wraith adversary. Choose a villain card among the drained cards, and gain power equal to its cost.
Failure: Destroy a support character.
Fancy Text:
Purge Wraith Queen from your hand, pay 2 power -- If you are the villain player, your opponent must [b]drain 4[/b], or [b]drain 6[/b] if there is an assigned Wraith adversary. Choose a villain card among the drained cards, and gain power equal to its cost.
[b]Failure:[/b] Destroy a support character.

name: Baldr
Subtitle: Lightbringer
Text: Each time you play an Asgard support character, you may stop Baldr. If you do, gain 1 power.
Fancy Text: Each time you play an Asgard support character, you may stop Baldr. If you do, gain 1 power.

name: Batu
Subtitle: Ha'tak Helmsman

Fancy Text: During each mission's ship battle, if Batu is assigned with a Jaffa hero ship, you get total firepower +1.

name: Bra'tac

Fancy Text: Discard Bra'tac from your hand, pay 1 power -- If the current mission is a [CULTURE] or a [COMBAT] mission, it gets difficulty -1.

name: Brightman

Fancy Text: Discard Brightman from your hand, pay X+1 power -- Destroy a [SCIENCE] obstacle at the current mission that costs X.

name: Coughlin
Subtitle: On Guard Duty

Fancy Text: Stop Coughlin -- Block an adversary from the current mission. You may pay 3 power. If you do, ready Coughlin.

name: Darren Becker
Subtitle: Ship Cook

Fancy Text: Discard Darren Becker from your hand, pay 1 power -- Choose a support character. They get skills +1 until the end of the current mission. If the chosen character is Destiny, this ability costs power -1 to activate.

Fancy Text: Discard Delek from your hand, pay X+1 power -- Destroy a [CULTURE] obstacle at the current mission that costs X.

name: Elizabeth Weir

Fancy Text: Discard Elizabeth Weir from your hand, pay 3 power -- If you are the hero player, look at one card from the top of your mission pile for each ready Atlantis character. Place those cards in any order on the top and/or bottom of that pile.

name: Evan Lorne

Fancy Text: Discard Evan Lorne from your hand -- Destroy a complication.

name: George Hammond

While George Hammond is ready, each time you succeed at a mission, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

Discard George Hammond from your hand, pay 4 power -- If you are the hero player, ready each assigned SGC team character.
While George Hammond is ready, each time you succeed at a mission, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

name: Halling

Discard Halling from your hand, pay 3 power -- Unblock a character.
When you place Halling in your discard pile (for whatever reason), draw a card.

Discard Halling from your hand, pay 3 power -- Unblock a character.
When you place Halling in your discard pile [i](for whatever reason)[/i], draw a card.

name: Harmony

Missions get difficulty +1.

Failure: Destroy Harmony.
Fancy Text:
Missions get difficulty +1.
[b]Success:[/b] Gain 3 power and draw 2 cards.

Fancy Text: Discard Harold Maybourne from your hand, pay 1 power -- If the current mission is a [SCIENCE] or an [INGENUITY] mission, it gets difficulty -1.

name: Kelmaa

Fancy Text: Discard Kelmaa from your hand, pay 3 power -- If you are the hero player, take an event card from your discard pile into hand. If that event card is Tok'ra, this ability costs power -1 to activate.

Fancy Text:

name: Luciano

Text:
Discard Luciano from your hand, pay 1 power -- If you are the hero player, choose one: Ready an assigned character; or ready two assigned NID characters.
Luciano costs power -1 to play for each NID character with a glyph.

Look at the top X cards of your mission pile. Place those cards in any order on the top and/or bottom of that pile.
Fancy Text:
To play this event, you must pay X power.
Look at the top X cards of your mission pile. Place those cards in any order on the top and/or bottom of that pile.

name: Mystery Destination
Text: Search you mission pile for two missions with different skill requirements, reveal them, and set them aside. Shuffle your mission pile. Your opponent chooses one of the revealed missions to be put on the top of your mission pile. Put the other on the bottom of that pile.
Fancy Text: Search you mission pile for two missions with different skill requirements, reveal them, and set them aside. Shuffle your mission pile. Your opponent chooses one of the revealed missions to be put on the top of your mission pile. Put the other on the bottom of that pile.

name: Sharing Experience
Text:
To play this event, discard a card and choose two assigned team characters who share an affiliation trait.
Raise the lowest contributed skill's rating among the chosen characters to become equal to that of the other.
Fancy Text:
To play this event, discard a card and choose two assigned team characters who share an affiliation trait.
Raise the lowest contributed skill's rating among the chosen characters to become equal to that of the other.

name: Ancient Transporter
Text: Stop this gear, pay 1 power - Look at the top card of your mission pile. You may place that card on the bottom of that pile.
Fancy Text: Stop this gear, pay 1 power - Look at the top card of your mission pile. You may place that card on the bottom of that pile.

name: AT4 Rocket Launcher
Text: Stop and destroy this gear, pay 3 power - Destroy an obstacle at the current mission or an assigned villain ship.
Fancy Text: Stop and destroy this gear, pay 3 power - Destroy an obstacle at the current mission or an assigned villain ship.

name: Destiny's Bridge
Text: Stop this gear, block a team character from the current mission - Choose a hero ship to get firepower +X until the end of the current mission, where X is equal to the blocked character's ingenuity.
Fancy Text: Stop this gear, block a team character from the current mission - Choose a hero ship to get firepower +X until the end of the current mission, where X is equal to the blocked character's [INGENUITY].

name: The Sword in the Stone
Text:
Stop this gear - The current mission gets difficulty +1 and: "Success: Place this gear beneath an assigned team character."
While this gear is beneath a character, they get experience +1.
Fancy Text:
Stop this gear - The current mission gets difficulty +1 and: "[b]Success:[/b] Place this gear beneath an assigned team character."
While this gear is beneath a character, they get experience +1.

name: Teleporter Armband
Text:
When you play this gear, place one charge counter on it.
Place this gear on a character - That character gets: "Destroy a charge counter on this gear, pay 1 power - Ready this character" and "Stop this character - Place a charge counter on this gear." You can use each of these abilities only once each turn.
Fancy Text:
When you play this gear, place one charge counter on it.
Place this gear on a character - That character gets: "Destroy a charge counter on this gear, pay 1 power - Ready this character" and "Stop this character - Place a charge counter on this gear." You can use each of these abilities only once each turn.

name: Virtual Reality Stasis Pod
Text:
When you play this gear, your opponent chooses an adversary card in his villain score pile. Place it beneath this gear.
When this gear is destroyed, place the adversary card beneath it in your opponent's villain score pile.
Fancy Text:
When you play this gear, your opponent chooses an adversary card in his villain score pile. Place it beneath this gear.
When this gear is destroyed, place the adversary card beneath it in your opponent's villain score pile.

name: Anti-Rebel Task Force
Text:
When you play this obstacle, choose a team character. They are blocked.
Failure: Your opponent chooses a glyph beneath the chosen character and puts it on the bottom of their mission pile.
Fancy Text:
When you play this obstacle, choose a team character. They are blocked.
[b]Failure:[/b] Your opponent chooses a glyph beneath the chosen character and puts it on the bottom of their mission pile.

name: Asuran Ascendancy
Text: Failure: Destroy each gear in play and each gear card attached to a character or a ship. Instead of placing them in their discard pile, your opponent shuffles the destroyed gear cards into their deck.
Fancy Text: [b]Failure:[/b] Destroy each gear in play and each gear card attached to a character or a ship. Instead of placing them in their discard pile, your opponent shuffles the destroyed gear cards into their deck.

name: Battle Formation
Text:
Dominion.
While this obstacle card is in your villain score pile, it gets cost +1.
Fancy Text:
[b]Dominion[/b].
While this obstacle card is in your villain score pile, it gets cost +1.

name: Beacon of Enlightenment
Text:
Ori obstacles cost power -1 to play while an Ori adversary is assigned.
Adversaries get revive cost -2 but can't be scored.
Fancy Text:
Ori obstacles cost power -1 to play while an Ori adversary is assigned.
Adversaries get revive cost -2 but can't be scored.

name: Blind Devotion
Text:
When you play this obstacle, ready an assigned character with 3 culture or more. They are blocked.
Failure: Stop the chosen character.
Fancy Text:
When you play this obstacle, ready an assigned character with 3 [CULTURE] or more. They are blocked.
[b]Failure:[/b] Stop the chosen character.

name: Celestis's Bulwark
Text:
When you play this obstacle, prepare this ambush.
While this ambush obstacle is prepared, each time an adversary would be destroyed, you may destroy this obstacle. If you do, they become stopped instead.
Ambush (science/combat): You may pay 1 power. If you do, prepare this ambush.
Fancy Text:
When you play this obstacle, prepare this ambush.
While this [b]ambush[/b] obstacle is prepared, each time an adversary would be destroyed, you may destroy this obstacle. If you do, they become stopped instead.
[b]Ambush ([SCIENCE]/[COMBAT]):[/b] You may pay 1 power. If you do, prepare this ambush.

name: Chokehold
Text:
When you play this obstacle, choose a team character. They are blocked.
Failure: Incapacitate the chosen team character.
Fancy Text:
When you play this obstacle, choose a team character. They are blocked.
[b]Failure:[/b] Incapacitate the chosen team character.

name: Cliffhanger
Text:
You can do nothing but pass until the end of the current mission.
Failure: Your opponent can't play any more missions this turn.
Fancy Text:
You can do nothing but pass until the end of the current mission.
[b]Failure:[/b] Your opponent can't play any more missions this turn.

name: Close Protection
Text: Support characters are blocked.
Fancy Text: Support characters are blocked.

name: Conversion
Text:
To play this obstacle, you must choose an assigned support character.
When you play this obstacle, place it on the chosen character and ready them. They become an adversary under your control, with no game text, the Ori trait, and a revive cost equal to their cost. They can't be scored.
Fancy Text:
To play this obstacle, you must choose an assigned support character.
When you play this obstacle, place it on the chosen character and ready them. They become an adversary under your control, with no game text, the Ori trait, and a revive cost equal to their cost. They can't be scored.

name: Crippled
Text:
When you play this obstacle, choose an assigned team character. They get skills -1 for each attachment they have. (Attachments are cards that are placed beneath or on another, like glyphs or some obstacles.)
Failure: Incapacitate the chosen character.
Fancy Text:
When you play this obstacle, choose an assigned team character. They get skills -1 for each attachment they have. [i](Attachments are cards that are placed beneath or on another, like glyphs or some obstacles.)[/i]
[b]Failure:[/b] Incapacitate the chosen character.

name: Crusade
Text:
When you play this obstacle, you may take an Ori obstacle or an Ori ship card from your discard pile into hand.
Failure: You may take this obstacle into hand.
Fancy Text:
When you play this obstacle, you may take an Ori obstacle or an Ori ship card from your discard pile into hand.
[b]Failure:[/b] You may take this obstacle into hand.

name: Distracted
Text:
When you play this obstacle, ready an assigned character with 3 ingenuity or more. They are blocked.
Failure: Stop the chosen character.
Fancy Text:
When you play this obstacle, ready an assigned character with 3 [INGENUITY] or more. They are blocked.
[b]Failure:[/b] Stop the chosen character.

name: Doomsday  Scenario
Text: Failure: If you control a Replicator adversary, you may blockade a mission beneath them.
Fancy Text: [b]Failure:[/b] If you control a Replicator adversary, you may blockade a mission beneath them.

name: Grisly Discovery
Text: When you play this obstacle, you may purge up to two character cards from your opponent's discard pile.
Fancy Text: When you play this obstacle, you may purge up to two character cards from your opponent's discard pile.

name: Ground Assault
Text:
Dominion.
At the beginning of this mission's ship battle, stop each assigned ship.
Fancy Text:
[b]Dominion[/b].
At the beginning of this mission's ship battle, stop each assigned ship.

name: Hijacked Ship
Text:
Outlaw.
When you play this obstacle, choose an assigned hero ship to get firepower -1 for each complication.
Victory: Place this obstacle on an incapacitated hero ship and stop it (it's no longer incapacitated). It becomes a villain ship under your control, with no game text.
Fancy Text:
[b]Outlaw[/b].
When you play this obstacle, choose an assigned hero ship to get firepower -1 for each complication.
[b]Victory:[/b] Place this obstacle on an incapacitated hero ship and stop it [i](it's no longer incapacitated)[/i]. It becomes a villain ship under your control, with no game text.

name: Iratus Bug Nest
Text:
Failure: Destroy a support character. Prepare this ambush.
Ambush (science/ingenuity): Until the end of the current mission, each time you play a Wraith obstacle, you may draw a card.
Fancy Text:
[b]Failure:[/b] Destroy a support character. Prepare this ambush.
[b]Ambush ([SCIENCE]/[INGENUITY]):[/b] Until the end of the current mission, each time you play a Wraith obstacle, you may draw a card.

name: Kel Shak Lo
Text:
This obstacle costs power -1 to play while a Jaffa adversary is assigned.
Failure: Destroy a support character. Prepare this ambush.
Ambush (culture/combat): Jaffa adversaries get difficulty +1 and revive cost -1 until the end of the current mission.
Fancy Text:
This obstacle costs power -1 to play while a Jaffa adversary is assigned.
[b]Failure:[/b] Destroy a support character. Prepare this ambush.
[b]Ambush ([CULTURE]/[COMBAT]):[/b] Jaffa adversaries get difficulty +1 and revive cost -1 until the end of the current mission.

name: Pinned Down
Text:
Dominion. Withdraw 1.
Failure: Each assigned adversary gets revive cost -1 (or -2 if they are Wraith).
Fancy Text:
[b]Dominion[/b]. [b]Withdraw 1[/b].
[b]Failure:[/b] Each assigned adversary gets revive cost -1 (or -2 if they are Wraith).

When you play this obstacle, your opponent draws 4 cards.
Failure: Your opponent must drain 4, or drain 8 if a Wraith adversary is assigned.
Fancy Text:
When you play this obstacle, your opponent draws 4 cards.
[b]Failure:[/b] Your opponent must [b]drain 4[/b], or [b]drain 8[/b] if a Wraith adversary is assigned.

name: Plot Twist
Text: When you play this obstacle, each ongoing effect from hero cards that would last "until the end of the current mission" or "until the end of the turn" ends immediately.
Fancy Text: When you play this obstacle, each ongoing effect from hero cards that would last "until the end of the current mission" or "until the end of the turn" ends immediately.

name: The Price of Disloyalty
Text: This obstacle gets difficulty +1 for each other Jaffa card at the current mission.
Fancy Text: This obstacle gets difficulty +1 for each other Jaffa card at the current mission.

name: Prowling Hunters

Dominion.
This obstacle gets science +2, ingenuity +2, and withdraw 2 while a Wraith adversary is assigned.
Fancy Text:
[b]Dominion[/b].
This obstacle gets [SCIENCE] +2, [INGENUITY] +2, and [b]withdraw 2[/b] while a Wraith adversary is assigned.

name: Recurring Nightmares

When you play this obstacle, you may stop a character with a Disease obstacle on them.
Failure: Place this obstacle on a character.
Fancy Text:
When you play this obstacle, you may stop a character with a Disease obstacle on them.
[b]Failure:[/b] Place this obstacle on a character.

name: Ripple Effect

Fancy Text: When you play this obstacle, choose a team character. Until the end of the current mission, other team characters lose all their skill ratings, traits and game texts, and get those of the chosen character.

name: Scorching Judgment
Text: When you play this obstacle, destroy an assigned support character.
Fancy Text: When you play this obstacle, destroy an assigned support character.

name: Thwarted Plans
Text:
To play this obstacle, you must stop an adversary.
When you play this obstacle, ready each assigned adversary.
Adversaries are blocked.
Fancy Text:
To play this obstacle, you must stop an adversary.
When you play this obstacle, ready each assigned adversary.
Adversaries are blocked.

name: Traitor's Reward
Text:
Outlaw.
To play this obstacle, destroy an adversary.
When you play this obstacle, gain power equal to the destroyed adversary's highest difficulty rating.
Fancy Text:
[b]Outlaw[/b].
To play this obstacle, destroy an adversary.
When you play this obstacle, gain power equal to the destroyed adversary's highest difficulty rating.

name: Unsanctioned Research
Text: When you play this obstacle, for each other Replicator card at the current mission, you may play a complication at no cost.
Fancy Text: When you play this obstacle, for each other Replicator card at the current mission, you may play a complication at no cost.

name: Vagonbrei Parasite
Text: Failure: Place this obstacle on an assigned character. They get: "Each time this character becomes stopped, place a sleep counter on them. Each time this character would become ready, if they have one or more sleep counters, destroy these counters instead" and "Success: Destroy this obstacle."
Fancy Text: [b]Failure:[/b] Place this obstacle on an assigned character. They get: "Each time this character becomes stopped, place a sleep counter on them. Each time this character would become ready, if they have one or more sleep counters, destroy these counters instead" and "[b]Success:[/b] Destroy this obstacle."

name: Vile Proposal
Text: When you play this obstacle, your opponent may stop two characters. If they don't, stop a character.
Fancy Text: When you play this obstacle, your opponent may stop two characters. If they don't, stop a character.

name: Alternate Teal'c
Subtitle: First Prime of Baal

Fancy Text: Each time you assign Alternate Teal'c, gain 1 power for each Jaffa obstacle at the current mission. If at least one of the Jaffa obstacles at this mission has [b]dominion[/b], you may draw a card.

name: Cunning Queen
Subtitle: Betrayer
Text:
While Cunning Queen is assigned, other Wraith adversaries that don't already have it get Wraith vassal.
Failure: Until the end of the mission, each time you pay the revive cost of a Wraith adversary, your opponent must drain an equal number of cards.
Fancy Text:
While Cunning Queen is assigned, other Wraith adversaries that don't already have it get [b]Wraith vassal[/b].
[b]Failure:[/b] Until the end of the mission, each time you pay the revive cost of a Wraith adversary, your opponent must [b]drain[/b] an equal number of cards.

name: Dutiful Prior
Subtitle: Witness of Prophecy
Text:
Ori vassal.
Ori adversaries assigned with Dutiful Prior get revive cost -2 (or -3 for Adria).
While Dutiful Prior is assigned, complications cost power -1 to play.
Fancy Text:
[b]Ori vassal.[/b]
Ori adversaries assigned with Dutiful Prior get revive cost -2 (or -3 for Adria).
While Dutiful Prior is assigned, complications cost power -1 to play.

name: Hale
Subtitle: Kelownan Commander

Fancy Text: While Hale is assigned to a [COMBAT] mission, you may ignore skill requirements when playing Political obstacles, and each time you play a Political obstacle, both Hale and that obstacle get [COMBAT] +1 until the end of the current mission.

name: Herak

Dominion. Goa'uld vassal.
While Herak is assigned, you may play Jaffa obstacles from your discard pile. If you do, each of those get: "When this card would be placed in your discard pile, purge it instead."

[b]Dominion[/b]. [b]Goa'uld vassal.[/b]
While Herak is assigned, you may play Jaffa obstacles from your discard pile. If you do, each of those get: "When this card would be placed in your discard pile, purge it instead."

name: Hive Ship Seed

Text:
Stop Hive Ship Seed, drain 3 - Disease obstacles cost power -1 to play until the end of the current mission.
Each time your opponent fails a mission, you may destroy Hive Ship Seed and pay 1 power. If you do, play a villain ship at no cost.
Fancy Text:
Stop Hive Ship Seed, [b]drain 3[/b] - Disease obstacles cost power -1 to play until the end of the current mission.
Each time your opponent fails a mission, you may destroy Hive Ship Seed and pay 1 power. If you do, play a villain ship at no cost.

name: Inquisitor Prior

Each time you assign Inquisitor Prior, choose a support character. While the chosen character is assigned to the current mission, each other assigned character gets skills -1.
Failure: Destroy the chosen character.

Each time you assign Inquisitor Prior, choose a support character. While the chosen character is assigned to the current mission, each other assigned character gets skills -1.

name: Joran

Joran gets difficulty +1 for each obstacle card in your villain score pile.

Fancy Text:
Joran gets difficulty +1 for each obstacle card in your villain score pile.
After each time you revive Joran, you may take a Jaffa obstacle or a Jaffa adversary card from your discard pile into hand.

name: Khalek

Text:
Khalek gets difficulty +1 and revive cost +1 for each ten cards in your opponent's discard pile.
Failure: Your opponent discards their hand.
Fancy Text:
Khalek gets difficulty +1 and revive cost +1 for each ten cards in your opponent's discard pile.
[b]Failure:[/b] Your opponent discards their hand.

name: Marduk

Fancy Text: [b]Success[/b] or [b]Failure:[/b] Incapacitate an assigned team character. If the mission was a success, destroy Marduk.

name: Ovirda

Text: Each time your opponent plays a combat or a science mission, you may destroy Ovirda. If you do, that mission becomes a culture or an ingenuity mission (you choose which).
Fancy Text: Each time your opponent plays a [COMBAT] or a [SCIENCE] mission, you may destroy Ovirda. If you do, that mission becomes a [CULTURE] or an [INGENUITY] mission [i](you choose which)[/i].

name: Primeval Queen
Subtitle: Forsaken
Text:
Primeval Queen gets difficulty +1 for each assigned support character.
Failure: Your opponent may drain X, where X is equal to Primeval Queen's ingenuity. If they do, gain X power. If they don't, incapacitate a team character.
Fancy Text:
Primeval Queen gets difficulty +1 for each assigned support character.
[b]Failure:[/b] Your opponent may [b]drain X[/b], where X is equal to Primeval Queen's [INGENUITY]. If they do, gain X power. If they don't, incapacitate a team character.

name: Rhea
Subtitle: Queen of Cronus

Fancy Text: Stop Rhea - Look at one card from the top of your deck for each assigned team character. Take one of those cards into hand and shuffle the rest into your deck. Discard a card.

name: Richard Woolsey
Subtitle: Hostile Investigator
Text:
Richard Woolsey costs power -2 to play for each failed mission this turn.
Failure: For each assigned character, look at one card from the top of your mission pile, then place them in any order on the top and/or bottom of that pile.
Fancy Text:
Richard Woolsey costs power -2 to play for each failed mission this turn.
[b]Failure:[/b] For each assigned character, look at one card from the top of your mission pile, then place them in any order on the top and/or bottom of that pile.

Stop Swarm Mother, purge a Replicator card from your discard pile, drain 2 - Play a Replicator obstacle at no cost.
Each time your opponent fails a mission, you may destroy Swarm Mother and pay 1 power. If you do, play a Replicator adversary at no cost.
Fancy Text:
Stop Swarm Mother, purge a Replicator card from your discard pile, [b]drain 2[/b] - Play a Replicator obstacle at no cost.
Each time your opponent fails a mission, you may destroy Swarm Mother and pay 1 power. If you do, play a Replicator adversary at no cost.

name: Thanos
Subtitle: Ruler of Langara

Thanos can't be blocked while the current mission is a science mission.
When you score Thanos, you may destroy a gear. If you do, gain power equal to its cost.
Fancy Text:
Thanos can't be blocked while the current mission is a [SCIENCE] mission.
When you score Thanos, you may destroy a gear. If you do, gain power equal to its cost.

name: Tiberian
Subtitle: Ransacking Zealot

Fancy Text: Each time you assign Tiberian, you may pay 1 power. If you do, your opponent chooses a card from their hand and places it face down at the current mission [i](it becomes a complication. It will be placed in its owner's discard pile when it is destroyed)[/i].

name: Wraith Hybrid

Dominion. Wraith vassal.

[b]Dominion[/b]. [b]Wraith vassal[/b].
[b]Failure:[/b] You may score one additional card with [b]dominion[/b] at the current mission.

Wraith vassal.

[b]Wraith vassal[/b].
Each time you assign Wraith Tracker, choose one: he gets dominion until the end of the current mission; or your opponent must [b]drain 1[/b] for each Wraith card in your villain score pile.

name: Yu

Fancy Text: While Yu is assigned, each Jaffa and/or Goa'uld obstacle at the current mission whose cost is 2 or less gets [b]dominion[/b].

name: Aiden Ford

Fancy Text: Stop and destroy Aiden Ford, pay 2 power, [b]drain 2[/b] - Destroy each assigned adversary except one chosen by your opponent.

name: Altman

Fancy Text: Stop a gear - Altman gets skills +1 until the end of the current mission. You can do this only once each turn.

name: Aris Boch

Text:
To play Aris Boch, choose an adversary and place a bounty token on them. (To assign an adversary who has a bounty token, your opponent must pay 1 power. Your opponent gets: "Pay 2 power - Destroy a bounty token.")
Aris Boch is blocked while the chosen.adversary has a bounty token.
Fancy Text:
To play Aris Boch, choose an adversary and place a [b]bounty token[/b] on them. [i](To assign an adversary who has a bounty token, your opponent must pay 1 power. Your opponent gets: "Pay 2 power - Destroy a bounty token.")[/i]
Aris Boch is blocked while the chosen.adversary has a bounty token.

name: Caulfield

Fancy Text: When you play Caulfield, you may discard a card and choose another character. If you do, until the end of the current mission, she loses all her skills and gains all the current skills of the chosen character.

name: Dol'ok

Fancy Text: Each time you fail a mission, you may destroy Dol'ok and discard a card. If you do, gain 1 power and, until the end of the turn, your cards consider the number of successful missions to be one higher.

Fancy Text: When you play Dovzhenko, your opponent gains 2 power unless you stop him or unless there was a failed mission this turn.

name: Dreylock

Your opponent's victory total is two points higher (even While you are the villain player).

Fancy Text:
Your opponent's victory total is two points higher [i](even While you are the villain player)[/i].
To assign Dreylock, discard a card.

name: Hoskins

Stop Hoskins, pay 2 power - Destroy an obstacle with the dominion keyword at the current mission.

Stop Hoskins, pay 2 power - Destroy an obstacle with the [b]dominion[/b] keyword at the current mission.

name: Jennifer Keller

Jennifer Keller gets skills +1 while she's assigned with another character who has a glyph.

Fancy Text:
Jennifer Keller gets skills +1 while she's assigned with another character who has a glyph.
Stop Jennifer Keller, discard a card - Destroy all [b]wound tokens[/b] on a character.

name: Katie Brown

Each time your opponent plays a Political obstacle or assigns a Political adversary, you may pay 2 power. If you do, ready Konstantin Nechayev.

Each time your opponent plays a Political obstacle or assigns a Political adversary, you may pay 2 power. If you do, ready Konstantin Nechayev.

name: Laura Michaels

Fancy Text: Each time you assign Laura Michaels, you may have your opponent lose 1 power. If you do, destroy her at the end of the current mission.

name: Linda Johnson
